headline: /C O R R E C T I O N -- FirstEnergy Corp./
summary: FirstEnergy Corp. (NYSE: FE) has earned national recognition from Forbes, securing spots on two respectable lists for 2026: America's Most Trusted Companies and America's Best Companies. These honors reflect FirstEnergy's ongoing commitment to operational excellence, customer service and creating a positive workplace culture.

headline: American Electric Positioned for Growth via Investments and Renewables
summary: AEP ramps up massive infrastructure and renewable investments even as high debt pressures its solvency outlook.
